alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms stretching from Lake Conroe to Lake Livingston... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Livingston to near Point Blank to near Lake Conroe Dam. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Huntsville, Willis, Livingston, The Woodlands, Trinity, Panorama Village, Onalaska, Groveton, New Waverly, Point Blank, Montgomery, Riverside, Sebastopol, northern West Livingston, Huntsville State Park, Lake Conroe Dam, Oakhurst, Dacus and Evergreen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Livingston or Lake Conroe, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Grimes; Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker
